original_text: Rules like that are only like shadows of real things that would happen later. But now we have what is real, Christ himself!
korean_text: 이것들은 장래 일의 그림자이나 몸은 그리스도의 것이니라

sentences.original_text: Rules like that are only like shadows
of real things that would happen later
But now we have what is real
sentences.korean_translation: 하지만 이제 우리는 실제 것을 가집니다
